title: Value Chain Analysis
description: An agent must analyze a client's business processes to map them to Porter's Value Chain framework.

tasks.description: Given a list of client business processes, categorize each as either a 'Primary Activity' or a 'Support Activity'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes processes like 'Logistics' as Primary and 'Human Resources' as Support.

tasks.description: For the Primary Activities, further categorize them into 'Inbound Logistics', 'Operations', 'Outbound Logistics', 'Marketing & Sales', and 'Service'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sub-categorizes the primary activities.

tasks.description: Identify one potential area for cost reduction or value creation within the mapped value chain.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable strategic recommendation, e.g., 'Optimize outbound logistics by consolidating shipments'.
